jd: From: Manish Kumar, Scalable Systems manish.kumar@scalable-systems.com Reply to: manish.kumar@scalable-systems.com Position: Lead Data Engineer with Airflow Exp.Location: Atlanta, GAStrategically architect, Design, develop industry-specific solutions in support of core enterprise functions based on client requirement and manage and upgrade existing applications.2) Articulate, Design, develop and Java Springboot microservices based on business requirements including integrations with internal and external systems.3) Ability to translate client’s business requirements into technical solution, based on java and Python platform’s and market best practices.4) Strong understanding of software engineering principles, databases and data modeling/design techniques; data interface protocols; caching/performance improvements; software design patterns and integration patterns.5) Provide inputs and direction to senior developers on the team for design and implementation.6) Define implementation processes, quality gates and standards.
